items.sentence: I think that you don't have enough money to buy that.
This is the hottest summer we've had in thirty years.
Do you think your sons will follow in your footsteps?
We'd really like to help you, but our hands are tied.
I gave up trying to act professional a long time ago.
Tom's parents are waiting for him at the finish line.
Tom didn't want to tell Mary he'd lost all her money.
I know that Tom won't like the wine that you brought.
I can't believe you know Tom! Why didn't you tell me?
Tom doesn't realise how his behaviour affects others.
Only a few of the passengers were wearing seat belts.
Tom thought that Mary was destined for bigger things.
When he opened the door he had nothing on but the TV.
This road will take you down to the edge of the lake.
That girl's under the delusion that she's a princess.
It looks like rain. You'd better take in the washing.
You'd better hurry because the banks will close soon.
I'd hardly checked into the hotel when Tom called me.
The school doesn't allow students to smoke on campus.
You should pack a couple of extra changes of clothes.
You can't just go out and buy a replacement for this.
Why did I have to fall in love with a woman like you?
I suspect that Tom and Mary have already left Boston.
Tom always eats breakfast, but Mary hardly ever does.
Tom didn't seem to be as scared as Mary seemed to be.
Tom has already taken Mary's suitcase out to the car.
Tom stared out of the window, watching the snow fall.
Tom told me that he didn't remember Mary's last name.
I'm scared of what others will do to me if I do that.
All humanity will suffer if a nuclear war breaks out.
English is spoken in many countries around the world.
I'll arrange for someone to pick you up at your home.
Seen from the plane, the island looks very beautiful.
I have to run to the station to catch the last train.
I don't think that you speak French better than I do.
I was surprised when Tom told me I needed to do that.
I was surprised when Tom told me Mary had to do that.
I wasn't as motivated to do that as Tom seemed to be.
I wasn't as reluctant to do that as Tom seemed to be.
I suspect Tom and Mary have never done that together.
I suspect Tom and Mary have both finished doing that.
I suspect Tom and Mary don't really enjoy doing that.
I think you're a great guy, but I'm in love with Tom.
I'm tired of my husband's trash cluttering up my car.
Tom wasn't at all surprised to see Mary at the party.
I don't like people who can't control their emotions.
Tom doesn't like his new job any better than farming.
Tom cut himself with the new knife you just gave him.
A lot of bad singers think that they're good singers.
I know it sounds crazy, but you've got to believe me.
